A cat is a small, carnivorous mammal belonging to the family Felidae. Known for their agility, grace, and independent nature, cats are often kept as pets. They are characterized by sharp claws, retractable when not in use, and a distinctive vocalization called a meow. Cats are highly adaptable and can be found in various environments, ranging from urban apartments to rural areas. They are recognized for their grooming habits, using their tongues to keep their coat clean. Some popular breeds of cats include the Siamese, Persian, Maine Coon, and British Shorthair.
